say1_welcome: Welcome to the board game dice roller, never roll your own dice again! Would you like to play Star Wars Imperial Assault or Descent 2?
welcome_back: Welcome back to the dice roller, your last played game was $1 and the campain was $2. Would you like to continue with this campain?
ia_start: Welcome to Star Wars Imperial Assault. Do you want to set up a new group or continue a current mission?
ia_group_name: What do you want to call your group?
d2_start: Welcome to Descent 2. This section is still under construction, please hang with us!
